title: Kittens grow up
creator_credit: Hugh Johnston, Suzanne Johnston and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: Studies the development of kittens from immediately after birth, through learning to walk, until they gain the ability to co-ordinate all their activities. Also covers the role of the mother cat in this development. Sequal to ‘Kittens are born’. Suitable for upper primary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Hugh Johnston, Suzanne Johnston and McGraw-Hill Films
